name: Season of Depression Disorder
description:
Merry Christmas!!! hands are colod from windows being open can barely type!!! please forgive me oh g

MADE IN 3 HOURS, YET ANOTHER ONE OF THOSE CLASSIC, "HPS1 HELL COLLABS"

You are forced to help uncle "twice as nice" bryce to get all of the cool creatures you keep!!!!

----------------------------------------

Use [SPACE] to collect terraballs, then use [SPACE] to deposit the skewered creature into the pen near uncky's house...

Use WASD to walk and strafe!!!!

Use Arrow Keys to look around!!!

Get to work!!!

----------------------------------------

Just Micah and Me this time, sorry!!!!!!

He did some of the assets, I did some of the assets, the game happened

also terra provided the terra ball
